statements: SELECT id, device_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, timestamp, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity > 60 ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59'
SELECT device_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(humidity) AS min_hum FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(timestamp) > 100
SELECT id, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT device_id, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY device_id ASC
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature < 20 OR humidity > 60
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature < 30 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT id, device_id, temperature, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY humidity ASC
SELECT device_id, failure_type FROM equipment_failure WHERE failure_type = 'malfunction' ORDER BY reported_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT device_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM sensor_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING avg_temperature > 30
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_info WHERE location = 'Lab A' AND device_name LIKE 'Sensor%';
SELECT device_id, failure_type, failure_description FROM equipment_failures ORDER BY failure_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, device_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_id DESC
SELECT failure_id, device_id, failure_type, failure_description FROM equipment_failures WHERE device_id = 5
SELECT device_name, location, model_number FROM device_info WHERE location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT * FROM sensor_data INNER JOIN device_info ON sensor_data.device_id = device_info.device_id
SELECT MAX(sensor_value), MIN(sensor_value), AVG(sensor_value) FROM sensor_data
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT * FROM equipment_status ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT prediction, confidence FROM failure_predictions WHERE prediction = 'failure' AND confidence > 0.5;
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'Brand X' AND location = 'Factory A'
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment INNER JOIN equipment_status ON equipment.equipment_id = equipment_status.equipment_id WHERE equipment_status.status = 'Active'
SELECT equipment_id, prediction, confidence FROM failure_predictions WHERE confidence > 0.8 AND prediction = 'Failure'
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM sensors
SELECT device_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_value > 100
SELECT location, reading_timestamp FROM sensors WHERE location LIKE 'Room%'
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY installation_date DESC
SELECT manufacturer, installation_date FROM devices WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT sensor_id, device_id, sensor_type, location, reading_timestamp, sensor_value FROM sensors ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT devices.device_id, manufacturer, installation_date, warranty_expiry_date, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM devices JOIN sensors ON devices.device_id = sensors.device_id WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung' AND sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, device_id, installation_date, equipment_type, maintenance_schedule_interval FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'sensor' ORDER BY installation_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT failures.failure_id, equipment_id, failure_timestamp, failure_description, installation_date, equipment_type FROM failures JOIN equipment ON failures.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id ORDER BY failure_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT maintenance_logs.log_id, equipment.equipment_id, device_id, maintenance_timestamp, maintenance_type, manufacturer FROM maintenance_logs JOIN equipment ON maintenance_logs.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id JOIN devices ON equipment.device_id = devices.device_id WHERE manufacturer = 'Sony' ORDER BY maintenance_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
